channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText™ -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText™ -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32266|2024-10-16T19:05:48.577Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- application%20lifecycle%20management%20%28alm%29%2Cquality%20center
item.description:
Untrusted Search Path vulnerability in OpenText™ Application Lifecycle Management (ALM),Quality Center allows Code Inclusion. The vulnerability allows a user to archive a malicious DLLs on the system prior to the installation.
This issue affects Application Lifecycle Management (ALM),Quality Center: 15.00, 15.01, 15.01 P1, 15.01 P2, 15.01 P3, 15.01 P4, 15.01 P5, 15.51, 15.51 P1, 15.51 P2, 15.51 P3, 16.00, 16.01 P1.

item.title: CVE-2024-6360|2024-10-02T16:30:37.533Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- vertica
item.description: Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource vulnerability in OpenText™ Vertica could allow Privilege Abuse and result in unauthorized access or privileges to Vertica agent apikey. This issue affects Vertica: from 10.0 through 10.X, from 11.0 through 11.X, from 12.0 through 12.X, from 23.0 through 23.X, from 24.0 through 24.X.

item.title: CVE-2024-7427|2024-08-23T18:56:47.870Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- network%20node%20manager%20i%20%28nnmi%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in OpenText™ Network Node Manager i (NNMi) could allow Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Network Node Manager i (NNMi): 2022.11, 2023.05, 23.4, 24.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-7260|2024-08-23T14:28:18.837Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- cx-e%20voice
item.description:
Path Traversal vulnerability discovered in OpenText™ CX-E Voice,
affecting all version through 22.4. The vulnerability could allow arbitrarily access files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-4187|2024-08-12T13:49:42.081Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- filr
item.description: Stored XSS vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ Filr product, affecting versions 24.1.1 and 24.2. The vulnerability could cause users to not be warned when clicking links to external sites.

item.title: CVE-2024-6361|2024-08-05T18:22:14.283Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- alm%20octane.
item.description: Improper Neutralization vulnerability (XSS) has been discovered in OpenText™ ALM Octane. The vulnerability affects all version prior to version 23.4. The vulnerability could cause remote code execution attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-4188|2024-08-01T20:33:52.392Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- documentum%E2%84%A2%20server
item.description: Unprotected Transport of Credentials vulnerability in OpenText™ Documentum™ Server could allow Credential Stuffing.This issue affects Documentum™ Server: from 16.7 through 23.4.

item.description:
Untrusted Search Path vulnerability in OpenText™ Application Lifecycle Management (ALM),Quality Center allows Code Inclusion. The vulnerability allows a user to archive a malicious DLLs on the system prior to the installation.
This issue affects Application Lifecycle Management (ALM),Quality Center: 15.00, 15.01, 15.01 P1, 15.01 P2, 15.01 P3, 15.01 P4, 15.01 P5, 15.51, 15.51 P1, 15.51 P2, 15.51 P3, 16.00, 16.01 P1.
